name: Dark Spawned
description:
Dark Spawned

Our submission to the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam!

Your objective is to destroy the 3 glowing spheres. You generally want to move to the right.

If this interested you we have a mailing list at https://www.getrevue.co/profile/corpse-demons if you'd like to stay up to date on our future game development progress!

Controls:

We've only test keyboard, but we mapped controller too.

Movement: WASD, Arrow Keys, Left joystick

Jump: Spacebar, Bottom button

Dash: Shift, Right shoulder

Attack: Left Click or F, Left button

Credits to:
Daniel Ojeda

   - Programming

   - Artwork

Patrick McCartney

   - Programming

   - Music

Dev note: Fixed lag issue, Sound issue, Music not played after dead sphere, Platforms collision problems.

Will add more functions, skills, mechanics, enemies, After voting period.
